sentences.en: After publication, it would of course become a required textbook.
sentences.cn: 出版以后, 当然是指定教本.

sentences.en: France Telecom is a textbook model of what can be achieved by a state-owned company.
sentences.cn: 法国电信是国有公司成功的典范。

sentences.en: He bought an up - to - date textbook.
sentences.cn: 他买了一本最新的教科书.

sentences.en: He was reading a math textbook in the library.
sentences.cn: 他在图书馆看一本数学教科书.

sentences.en: I gave the textbook back to him.

sentences.cn: 我不知把英语课本丢在哪儿了.

sentences.en: It is not just a textbook for professional diplomats. The lay reader will enjoy the anecdotes.
sentences.cn: 它不仅仅是职业外交家的教科书，里面的轶事趣闻外行的读者也会喜欢。

sentences.en: Long passages in this textbook have been lifted from other authors.
sentences.cn: 此教科书中有几大段是剽窃其他作者的.

sentences.en: She wrote a textbook on international law.
The boy forgot where he put his textbook.
sentences.cn: 那男孩忘记把课本放在什么地方了.

sentences.en: The compilers agreed upon a division of the textbook into twelve units.
sentences.cn: 编写者都同意把教科书分成十二个单元.

sentences.en: The house is a textbook example of medieval domestic architecture.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是典型的中世纪民居。

sentences.en: The wind is a textbook birds must read every day.

trans.tran_en: a book that contains information about a subject that people study, especially at school or college
